mapper.sql: material_in_id, material_id, material_name, material_in_num, in_unit, gmt_create, gmt_update, yn
mapper.insert: insert into tb_material_in (material_in_id, material_id, material_name, material_in_num, in_unit, gmt_create, gmt_update, yn) values (#{materialInId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialInNum,jdbcType=REAL}, #{inUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), now(),0)

material_in_id,
material_id,
material_name,

in_unit,

yn,

mapper.update:
update tb_material_in
material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_in_num = #{materialInNum,jdbcType=REAL},
in_unit = #{inUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where material_in_id = #{materialInId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tb_material_in set material_id = #{materialId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_in_num = #{materialInNum,jdbcType=REAL}, in_unit = #{inUnit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_update = #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yn = #{yn,jdbcType=INTEGER} where material_in_id = #{materialInId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( select
from tb_material_in WHERE yn = 0
AND DATE_FORMAT(gmt_create,'%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
GROUP BY material_id ) AS c
